greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of partitions of {1, 2, ..., 2n} into pairs whose differences are primes.
maple: and isprime(j-i), b(s minus {i, j}), 0), i=s))(max(s)))
mathematica: b[s_] := b[s] = If[s == {}, 1, Function[j, Sum[If[i < j && PrimeQ[j - i], b[s ~Complement~ {i, j}], 0], {i, s}]][Max[s]]];
Table[Print[n, " ", a[n]]; a[n], {n, 0, 18}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Mar 01 2021, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
results.author: _David W. Wilson_
ext: a(0), a(14)-a(18) from _Alois P. Heinz_, Nov 15 2016
